verbs.description: sony michel [V: says] [ARG1: injured knee feels pretty good] seems hopeful to play vs packers it appears the patriots will be getting running back sony michel back faster than it seemed when the rookie suffered a knee injury against the bears it seemed like it had the potential to be season - ending but michel was back at practice last saturday and after missing the game last week against the bills was a limited participant in every practice this week i feel pretty good he said friday just been working hard and trying georgia bears new england patriots foxboro patriots packers green bay packers sony bills michel
